Heavy-Light decomposition

Posted May 12, 2023
By Han Seungjun
23 min read
Heavy-Light decomposition
Heavy-Light decomposition

HLD(Heavy Light Decomposition)

üí° Ìä∏Î¶¨ÏóêÏÑú ÏûÑÏùòÏùò Îëê Ï†ïÏ†êÏùÑ ÏûáÎäî Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏøºÎ¶¨Í∞Ä Í∂ÅÍ∏àÌï† Îïå.

Íµ¨ÌòÑÍ≥ºÏ†ï

Íµ¨ÌòÑÍ≥ºÏ†ïÏùÄ jinhanÎãòÏùò Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Î•º Ï∞∏Í≥†ÌïòÏó¨ Íµ¨ÌòÑÌñàÎã§.

  1. Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÍ∞Ä ÏûàÎäî Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑÎùºÎ©¥ adjÏóê Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò ÏóÜÎäî Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑÎ•º ÎßåÎì§Í≥†, cost[Ï†ïÏ†ê]Ïóê Ìï¥Îãπ Ï†ïÏ†êÏúºÎ°ú Í∞à Îïå ÎìúÎäî ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÑ Ï†ÄÏû•ÌïúÎã§. Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† input[i] = {u, v}Ïù¥Îü∞ ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Ï†ïÏ†êÏóê Î≤àÌò∏Î•º Î∂ôÏó¨Ï§ÄÎã§.(ÏÑ∏Í∑∏Ìä∏Î¶¨Î°ú Îã§Î£®Í∏∞ ÏúÑÌï®)
  2. dfs1ÏùÑ ÎèåÎ©¥ÏÑú Í∞Å Ï†ïÏ†êÏùò ÍπäÏù¥(dep), Í∞Å Ï†ïÏ†êÏùò Î∂ÄÎ™® Ï†ïÏ†ê(par), Í∞Å Ï†ïÏ†êÏù¥ ÎßåÎìúÎäî ÏÑúÎ∏åÌä∏Î¶¨ ÌÅ¨Í∏∞(sz)Î•º Ï†ÄÏû•ÌïúÎã§. Ïù¥ Îïå adj[Ï†ïÏ†ê][0]ÏóêÎäî Í∞ÄÏû• Î¨¥Í±∞Ïö¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†Ïù¥ ÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïúÎã§.
  3. dfs2Î•º ÎèåÎ©¥ÏÑú Ïò§ÏùºÎü¨Ìà¨Ïñ¥ ÌÖåÌÅ¨ÎãâÏùÑ Ï†ÅÏö©ÌïòÍ≥† Ï†ïÏ†êÏù¥ Î¨¥Í±∞Ïö¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ ÏßÄÎãàÎäî Ï†ïÏ†êÏù∏ÏßÄÎ•º Ï≤¥ÌÅ¨ÌïúÎã§. (top)

Ï†ïÎ¶¨Ìï¥Î≥¥Î©¥

  • input[i] = iÎ≤àÏß∏ Ï†ïÏ†êÏùÄ {xxÏ†ïÏ†ê, yyÏ†ïÏ†ê}Î•º ÏûáÎäî Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏûÖÎãàÎã§.
  • inp[i] : ÏßÅÏ†ë ÏûÖÎ†• Î∞õÏùÄ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÍ∞Ä ÏûàÎäî Ïù∏Ï†ë Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏ Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑ
  • adj[i] : inpÏùÑ Î∞îÍøîÏÑú Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÎ•º ÎñºÏñ¥ÎÇ∏ Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑ
  • cost[i] : iÎ≤à Ïß∏ Ï†ïÏ†êÍπåÏßÄ Í∞ÄÎäîÎç∞ ÎìúÎäî Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò(ÎπÑÏö©)
  • dep, par, szÎäî ÏúÑÏóê ÏÑ§Î™ÖÌñàÍ≥†
  • in, out ‚Üí Ïò§ÏùºÎü¨ Ìà¨Ïñ¥ ÌÖåÌÅ¨Îãâ(DFS ordering)ÌïòÍ≥† ÎÇú Í≤∞Í≥º in[Ïñ¥Îñ§ Ï†ïÏ†ê]Ïù¥ ÏßÄÏπ≠ÌïòÎäî Í∞ÑÏÑ† Î≤àÌò∏
  • top[i] : iÎ≤à Ï†ïÏ†êÏù¥ Î¨¥Í±∞Ïö¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®ÌïòÎ©¥ 0 ÏïÑÎãàÎ©¥ Î¨¥Í±∞Ïö¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®ÌïòÎäî Ï†ïÏ†êÏùÑ Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï¥Îë†.

Ïù¥Ï†ú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Ìï¥Í≤∞Ìï¥Î≥¥Ïûê!

  1. Îëê Ï†ïÏ†êÏùÑ ÏûáÎäî Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóêÏÑú Í∞ÄÏû• ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÑ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÄ Î¨¥ÏóáÏùºÍπå?
  2. Ïù¥ Îïå, Í∞ÑÏÑ†Ïùò Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÎäî Î≥ÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. ‚Üí 13510 Ìä∏Î¶¨ÏôÄ ÏøºÎ¶¨

ÏúÑÏùò Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Ìï¥Í≤∞Ìï† Í≤É Ïù¥Îã§.

//update Ïó∞ÏÇ∞ , xstÎäî maxSegmentTreeÏù¥Îã§.
// i Î≤à Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ valÎ°ú
    void update(T i, T val){
        if(dep[input[i].xx] < dep[input[i].yy]) swap(input[i].xx, input[i].yy);
        xst.update(in[input[i].xx], val, 1, 1, n);
    }

ÏúÑ ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Î≥¥Î©¥ depÍ∞Ä ÍπäÏùÄ Ï†ïÏ†êÏóê Ìï¥ÎãπÌïòÎäî Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ valÎ°ú Î≥ÄÌôîÏãúÌÇ®Îã§. 2Î≤àÏóê Ìï¥ÎãπÌïòÎäî ÏΩîÎìúÏù¥Îã§.

//query Ïó∞ÏÇ∞
//u, vÏúÑ Í∞ÄÏû• ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò
    T query(T u, T v){
        T ret = 0;
        while(top[u]!=top[v]){
            if(dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            int st = top[u];
            ret = max(ret, xst.xquery(in[st], in[u], 1, 1, n));
            u = par[st];
        }
        if(u==v) return ret;
        if(dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        T nxt = -1;
        for(auto i : adj[u]) if(top[i]==top[u]) nxt = i;
        ret = max(ret, xst.xquery(in[nxt], in[v], 1, 1, n));
        return ret;
    }

Ïù¥Îäî 1Î≤à - Ï¶â Í≤ΩÎ°úÏóêÏÑú Í∞ÄÏû• ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÎ•º Íµ¨ÌïòÎäî ÏøºÎ¶¨Ïù¥Îã§.

top[Ïñ¥Îñ§ Ï†ïÏ†ê]ÏùÄ Í∞ÑÏÑ† Î∂ÑÎ•òÏùò Îß® ÏúÑÎ°ú Ïò¨ÎùºÍ∞ÑÎã§Îäî ÎúªÏù¥Îã§.

ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥ 5 - 7Î°ú Í∞ÑÎã§Í≥† ÌïòÎ©¥

  1. 5Îûë 7Ïùò ÍπäÏù¥Í∞Ä Í∞ôÏúºÎãàÍπå u = 5, v = 7
  2. uÎ•º st = top[u] = 2Ïù¥Îã§. ÌååÎûÄ Í∞ÑÏÑ†Ïù¥ ÎÅùÎÇòÎäî Ï†ïÏ†êÍπåÏßÄ Í∞ÄÍ≥†
  3. Ïù¥ Îïå ÏÑ∏Í∑∏Î®ºÌä∏ Ìä∏Î¶¨Î°ú Í≤ΩÎ°ú ÏÉÅ ÌååÎûÄ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ Î™®Îëê ÎçîÌïúÎã§(ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞íÏùÑ Ï∞æÎäîÎã§).
  4. Îã§ÏùåÏóî u = 7, v = 2Í∞Ä Îê† Í≤ÉÏù¥Í≥† top[u] = 1Ïù¥Îã§. ‚Üí Í≤ΩÎ°ú ÏÉÅ ÎÖ∏ÎûÄÍ∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ Î™®Îëê ÎçîÌïúÎã§.(ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞íÏùÑ Ï∞æÎäîÎã§)
  5. Îã§ÏùåÏóî u = 2, v = 1Ïù¥ Îê† Í≤ÉÏù¥Í≥† top[2] = 1Ïù¥Îã§. ‚Üí Í≤ΩÎ°ú ÏÉÅ Îπ®Í∞Ñ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ Î™®Îëê ÎçîÌïúÎã§.(ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞íÏùÑ Ï∞æÎäîÎã§)

Ïù¥Îü∞ ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Î¨¥Í±∞Ïö¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Î∂ÑÎ•òÌïú Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏúºÎ°ú Ï≠âÏ≠â Ïù¥ÎèôÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú Ï≤òÎ¶¨ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ HLDÏù¥Îã§.

Ïù¥Îïå Ïù¥ Í∞ÑÏÑ†Ïùò Ï¢ÖÎ•òÍ∞Ä $logN$Í∞ú Ïù¥ÎØÄÎ°ú ÏÑ∏Í∑∏Î®ºÌä∏ Ìä∏Î¶¨Î•º ÌïòÎäî $logN$Í≥º Ìï©Ï≥ê

Ï¥ù ÏãúÍ∞Ñ Î≥µÏû°ÎèÑ : $O((logN)^2)$ÏúºÎ°ú Í∞Å ÏøºÎ¶¨Î•º Ìï¥Í≤∞ Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§.

13309 Ìä∏Î¶¨

Ìä∏Î¶¨Í∞Ä Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò 1Î°ú Î™®Îëê Ïó∞Í≤∞ ÎêòÏñ¥ÏûàÎã§Í≥† ÌïòÍ≥† Ïó∞Í≤∞Ïù¥ ÎÅäÏñ¥ÏßÄÎ©¥ updateÏó∞ÏÇ∞ÏúºÎ°ú Ìï¥ÎãπÍ∞ÑÏÑ†Ïùò Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπòÎ•º 0ÏúºÎ°ú Î∞îÍøîÏ§ÄÎã§. Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥†ÎÇòÏÑú Íµ¨Ìïú Í≤ΩÎ°úÏùò Í∏∏Ïù¥Í∞Ä $dep[u] + dep[v] - dep[lca(u, v)]$ ÏôÄ Í∞ôÎã§Î©¥ Í≤ΩÎ°úÍ∞Ä Ï°¥Ïû¨ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥Í≥† ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Í≤ΩÏö∞Îäî Í≤ΩÎ°úÍ∞Ä Ï°¥Ïû¨ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§.

ÏΩîÎìúÎäî ÏïÑÎûòÏôÄ Í∞ôÎã§.

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define fast_io cin.tie(NULL); ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef tuple<int, int, int> tiii;
#define xx first
#define yy second

const int MAXSIZE = 2e5+1;

// Íµ¨Í∞ÑÌï© ÏÑ∏Í∑∏
template <class T>
class Segtree{
public:
    static const int TREESIZE = 4*MAXSIZE;
    T* tree = new T[TREESIZE];

    Segtree(){
        for(int i=0;i<TREESIZE;i++) tree[i] = 0;
    }
    ~Segtree(){
        delete[] tree;
    }
    T update(T x, T v, T node, T S, T E){
        if(S==E) return tree[node] = v; // ÏõêÏÜåÍµêÏ≤¥Ïó∞ÏÇ∞, ÎçîÌïòÍ∏∞Î©¥ +ÌïòÏÖà
        
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(x<=mid) update(x, v, 2*node, S, mid);
        else update(x, v, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
        return tree[node] = tree[2*node]+tree[2*node+1];
    }
    T kth(T node, T S, T E, T K){
        if(S==E) return S;
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(tree[2*node]>=K) return kth(2*node, S, mid, K);
        else return kth(2*node+1, mid+1, E, K-tree[2*node]);
    }
    T query(T L, T R, T node, T S, T E){
        if(L>E||R<S) return 0;
        if(L<=S&&E<=R) return tree[node];
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        return query(L, R, 2*node, S, mid)+query(L, R, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
    }
};
// Í≤ΩÎ°ú Ï§ë ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞í Ï∞æÍ∏∞
template <class T>
class HLD{
public:
    int n;
    T cost[MAXSIZE], sz[MAXSIZE], dep[MAXSIZE], par[MAXSIZE];
    T top[MAXSIZE], in[MAXSIZE], out[MAXSIZE];
    vector<pair<T, T>> input, inp[MAXSIZE];
    vector<T> adj[MAXSIZE];
    
    bool visited[MAXSIZE];
    
    void dfs(int now = 1){
        visited[now] = 1;
        for(auto [ncost, nxt] : inp[now]){
            if(visited[nxt]) continue;
            adj[now].push_back(nxt);
            cost[nxt] = ncost;
            dfs(nxt);
        }
    }
    
    void dfs1(int now = 1){
        sz[now] = 1;
        for(T& nxt : adj[now]){
            dep[nxt] = dep[now]+1;
            par[nxt] = now;
            dfs1(nxt);
            sz[now] += sz[nxt];
            if(sz[nxt]>sz[adj[now][0]]) swap(nxt, adj[now][0]); //adj[now][0]ÏóêÎäî Í∞ÄÏû•ÌÅ∞Í≤É (heavy)
        }
    }
    
    int tmp = 0;
    void dfs2(int now = 1){
        in[now] = ++tmp;
        for(T nxt : adj[now]){
            top[nxt] = (nxt==adj[now][0] ? top[now] : nxt);
            dfs2(nxt);
        }
        out[now] = tmp;
    }
    
    Segtree<T> st;
    
    // i Î≤à Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ valÎ°ú
    void update(T i, T val){
        if(dep[input[i].xx] < dep[input[i].yy]) swap(input[i].yy, input[i].xx);
        st.update(in[input[i].xx], val, 1, 1, n);
    }
    
    //u, vÏúÑ Í∞ÄÏû• ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò
    T query(T u, T v){
        T ret = 0;
        while(top[u]!=top[v]){
            if(dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            int ST = top[u];
            ret += st.query(in[ST], in[u], 1, 1, n);
            u = par[ST];
        }
        if(u==v) return ret;
        if(dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        ret += st.query(in[u], in[v], 1, 1, n);
        int LCA = lca(u, v);
        ret -= st.query(in[LCA], in[LCA], 1, 1, n);
        return ret;
    }
    
    int lca(int u, int v) {
        while (top[u] != top[v]) {
            if (dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            u = par[top[u]];
        }
        if (dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        return u;
    }
    
    void precal(){
        input = vector<pair<T, T> > (n+1);
        for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){
            int p; cin >> p;
            input[i-1] = {p, i};
            inp[p].push_back({1, i});
            inp[i].push_back({1, p});
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            st.update(i, 1, 1, 1, n);
        }
        top[1] = 1;
        dfs(); dfs1(); dfs2();
    }
};
HLD<int> hld;

int main(){
    fast_io
    int n, q; cin >> n >> q;
    hld.n = n;
    hld.precal();
    while (q--) {
        int u, v, o; cin >> u >> v >> o;
        bool ok = false;
        if(hld.query(u, v)==hld.dep[u]+hld.dep[v]-2*hld.dep[hld.lca(u, v)]){
            ok = true;
            cout << "YES\n";
        }else{
            cout << "NO\n";
        }
        if(o){
            if(ok) hld.st.update(hld.in[u], 0, 1, 1, n);
            else hld.st.update(hld.in[v], 0, 1, 1, n);
        }
        
    }
}

13512 Ìä∏Î¶¨ÏôÄ ÏøºÎ¶¨3

  1. 1Î≤à ÏøºÎ¶¨Îäî Ìä∏Î¶¨Ïùò ÏÉâÏùÑ Î∞îÍæ∏Îäî Ïó∞ÏÇ∞ÏùÄ XOR 1Ïó∞ÏÇ∞ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Ìï¥Í≤∞ Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏùÑ Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§.
  2. 2Î≤à ÏøºÎ¶¨Îäî 1Î≤à Î∂ÄÌÑ∞ Ìï¥Îãπ Ï†ïÏ†êÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÎ©¥ÏÑú Í∞ÄÏû• Î®ºÏ†Ä ÎÇòÏò§Îäî 1ÏùÑ Ï∞æÏúºÎ©¥ ÎêúÎã§.

2Î≤à ÏøºÎ¶¨Î•º Ï≤òÎ¶¨ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Î¨∏Ï†úÏù∏Îç∞‚Ä¶

Í∞ÄÏû• Î®ºÏ†Ä ÎÇòÏò§Îäî 1ÏùÑ Íµ¨ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÄ Ïù¥Î∂Ñ ÌÉêÏÉâÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ ÎêúÎã§.

T bisearch(T L, T R){
        if(!query(L, R, 1, 1, MAXSIZE)) return -1;
        T lo = L-1 , hi = R;
        while(lo+1<hi){
            T mid = (lo+hi)>>1;
//LÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ Í≤ÄÏÇ¨ÌïòÎäîÍ≤å Ï§ëÏöî!! loÎäî off-by-one errorÎïúÏóê 1ÏùÑ Î∫èÏùå
            if(query(L, mid, 1, 1, MAXSIZE)){
                hi = mid;
            }else{
                lo = mid;
            }
        }
        return hi;
    }

Ïù¥Î•º Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Íµ¨Í∞ÑÏóê 1Ïù¥ Ï°¥Ïû¨ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©¥ Î∞îÎ°ú -1 Î¶¨ÌÑ¥

Íµ¨Í∞ÑÏóê Ï°¥Ïû¨ÌïòÎ©¥ Í∞ÄÏû• Î®ºÏ†ÄÎÇòÏò§Îäî Í≥≥Ïùò dfs order Î≤àÌò∏Î•º Î¶¨ÌÑ¥ÌïúÎã§.

Î¨∏Ï†úÎäî Í∞ÄÏû• Î®ºÏ†Ä 1Ïù¥ ÎÇòÏò§Îäî Í≥≥Ïùò Ï†ïÏ†ê idxÎ•º Ï∂úÎ†•ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥Í∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê dfs orderingÏùÑ Ìï† Îïå Ïó≠Ìï®ÏàòÎ•º Íµ¨Ìï¥ÎÜìÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Ìé∏ÌïòÎã§. ÎÇòÎäî RÏù¥ÎùºÎäî Î∞∞Ïó¥ÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïö©ÌñàÎã§.

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define fast_io cin.tie(NULL); ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef tuple<int, int, int> tiii;
#define xx first
#define yy second

const int MAXSIZE = 1e5+1;

// Íµ¨Í∞ÑÌï© ÏÑ∏Í∑∏
template <class T>
class Segtree{
public:
    static const int TREESIZE = 4*MAXSIZE;
    T* tree = new T[TREESIZE];

    Segtree(){
        for(int i=0;i<TREESIZE;i++) tree[i] = 0;
    }
    ~Segtree(){
        delete[] tree;
    }
    T update(T x, T v, T node, T S, T E){
        if(S==E) return tree[node] ^= v; // ÏõêÏÜåÍµêÏ≤¥Ïó∞ÏÇ∞, ÎçîÌïòÍ∏∞Î©¥ +ÌïòÏÖà
        
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(x<=mid) update(x, v, 2*node, S, mid);
        else update(x, v, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
        return tree[node] = tree[2*node]+tree[2*node+1];
    }
    T kth(T node, T S, T E, T K){
        if(S==E) return S;
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(tree[2*node]>=K) return kth(2*node, S, mid, K);
        else return kth(2*node+1, mid+1, E, K-tree[2*node]);
    }
    T query(T L, T R, T node, T S, T E){
        if(L>E||R<S) return 0;
        if(L<=S&&E<=R) return tree[node];
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        return query(L, R, 2*node, S, mid)+query(L, R, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
    }
    T bisearch(T L, T R){
        if(!query(L, R, 1, 1, MAXSIZE)) return -1;
        T lo = L-1 , hi = R;
        while(lo+1<hi){
            T mid = (lo+hi)>>1;
            if(query(L, mid, 1, 1, MAXSIZE)){
                hi = mid;
            }else{
                lo = mid;
            }
        }
        return hi;
    }
};
// Í≤ΩÎ°ú Ï§ë ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞í Ï∞æÍ∏∞
template <class T>
class HLD{
public:
    int n;
    T cost[MAXSIZE], sz[MAXSIZE], dep[MAXSIZE], par[MAXSIZE];
    T top[MAXSIZE], in[MAXSIZE], out[MAXSIZE];
    T R[MAXSIZE]; //inÏùò Ïó≠Ìï®ÏàòÎ•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌñàÏùå
    vector<pair<T, T>> input, inp[MAXSIZE];
    vector<T> adj[MAXSIZE];
    
    bool visited[MAXSIZE];
    
    void dfs(int now = 1){
        visited[now] = 1;
        for(auto [ncost, nxt] : inp[now]){
            if(visited[nxt]) continue;
            adj[now].push_back(nxt);
            cost[nxt] = ncost;
            dfs(nxt);
        }
    }
    
    void dfs1(int now = 1){
        sz[now] = 1;
        for(T& nxt : adj[now]){
            dep[nxt] = dep[now]+1;
            par[nxt] = now;
            dfs1(nxt);
            sz[now] += sz[nxt];
            if(sz[nxt]>sz[adj[now][0]]) swap(nxt, adj[now][0]); //adj[now][0]ÏóêÎäî Í∞ÄÏû•ÌÅ∞Í≤É (heavy)
        }
    }
    
    int tmp = 0;
    void dfs2(int now = 1){
        in[now] = ++tmp;
        R[tmp] = now;
        for(T nxt : adj[now]){
            top[nxt] = (nxt==adj[now][0] ? top[now] : nxt);
            dfs2(nxt);
        }
        out[now] = tmp;
    }
    
    Segtree<T> st;
    
    // i Î≤à Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ valÎ°ú
    void update(T i, T val){
        if(dep[input[i].xx] < dep[input[i].yy]) swap(input[i].yy, input[i].xx);
        st.update(in[input[i].xx], val, 1, 1, n);
    }
    
    //u, vÏúÑ Í∞ÄÏû• Î®ºÏ†ÄÎÇòÏò§Îäî 1
    T query(T u, T v){
        T ret = -1;
        while(top[u]!=top[v]){
            if(dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            int ST = top[u];
            int now = st.bisearch(in[ST], in[u]);
            if(now>0) ret = now;
            u = par[ST];
        }
            
        if(dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        int now = st.bisearch(in[u], in[v]);
        if(now>0) ret = now;
        return ((ret==-1) ? ret : R[ret]);
    }
    
    int lca(int u, int v) {
        while (top[u] != top[v]) {
            if (dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            u = par[top[u]];
        }
        if (dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        return u;
    }
    
    void precal(){
        input = vector<pair<T, T> > (n+1);
        for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){
            int u, v; cin >> u >> v;
            input[i-1] = {u, v};
            inp[u].push_back({1, v});
            inp[v].push_back({1, u});
        }
        top[1] = 1;
        dfs(); dfs1(); dfs2();
    }
};
HLD<int> hld;

int main(){
    fast_io
    int n, q; cin >> n;
    hld.n = n;
    hld.precal();
    cin >> q;
    while (q--) {
        int op, v; cin >> op >> v;
        if(op==1){
            hld.st.update(hld.in[v], 1, 1, 1, MAXSIZE);
        }else{
            cout << hld.query(1, v) << '\n';
        }
    }
}

2927 ÎÇ®Í∑πÌÉêÌóò

Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ìä∏Î¶¨ Íµ¨Ï°∞Í∞Ä ÌôïÏ†ïÎêú ÏÉÅÌÉúÏóêÏÑú HLDÎ•º Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º ÌíÄÏóàÏßÄÎßå Ïù¥ Î¨∏Ï†úÎäî Ìä∏Î¶¨ Íµ¨Ï°∞Í∞Ä ÏôÑÏÑ±ÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏßÄ ÏïäÎã§. Ïù¥Îü∞ Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÏôÑÏÑ± ÎêòÏóàÏùÑ ÎïåÏùò Î¨∏Ï†úÎ°ú ÏπòÌôòÏùÑ ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ ÌïÑÏöîÌïòÎã§.

Ïù¥ Îïå Ïò§ÌîÑÎùºÏù∏ ÏøºÎ¶¨Î•º Ïù¥Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

ÏùºÎã®, bridgeÏó∞ÏÇ∞ÏùÄ Union FindÎ•º Îñ†Ïò¨Î¶¥ Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. Í∑∏Î†áÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê Ïù¥ Ïó∞ÏÇ∞ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ÏßÑ Í∑∏ÎûòÌîÑÎäî Î¨¥Ï°∞Í±¥ Ìä∏Î¶¨ ÌòïÌÉúÏù¥Îã§. ÌïòÏßÄÎßå bridgeÏó∞ÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Ï†ïÌôïÌûà n-1Í∞úÏùò yesÍ∞Ä ÎÇòÏò®Îã§Îäî Î≥¥Ïû•Ïù¥ ÏóÜÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê Ïó¨Îü¨ Ìä∏Î¶¨Í∞Ä ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ Ïßà Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. Ïó¨Îü¨ Ìä∏Î¶¨Î•º Ìï©Ï≥êÏÑú ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Ìä∏Î¶¨Î•º ÎßåÎìúÎäî ÏïÑÏù¥ÎîîÏñ¥Î•º Îñ†Ïò¨Î¶¥ Ïàò ÏûàÏóàÎã§.

Ïù¥Ï†ú excursion Ïó∞ÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Í≥†ÎØºÌï¥Î≥¥Ïûê.

excursionÏùÄ ÏùºÎã® Í∏∏Ïù¥ ÏóÜÏúºÎ©¥ ‚Äúinpossible‚ÄùÏùÑ Ï∂úÎ†•ÌïúÎã§. Í∑ºÎç∞ Ïù¥ Í≤ΩÏö∞Îäî Í∑∏ÎÉ• ÏàúÏÑúÎåÄÎ°ú Î≥¥Î©¥ÏÑúÎèÑ Ìï¥Í≤∞ Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Í∏∏Ïù¥ ÏûàÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞Îäî Ìä∏Î¶¨ÏóêÏÑúÎäî Ï†ïÏ†ê u, v ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ïùò Í∏∏Ïù¥ ÌïòÎÇò Î∞ñÏóê ÏóÜÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê Í∑∏ÎÉ• HLDÏù¥Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ ÎêúÎã§.

Í≤∞Î°† :

‚Üí ÏàúÏÑúÎåÄÎ°ú Î≥¥Î©¥ÏÑú excursionÏ§ëÏóê Î∂àÍ∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Í±∞Îäî ÎØ∏Î¶¨ Í≥®Îùº ÎëîÎã§.

‚Üí Ïù¥Ï†ú ÏôÑÏÑ±Îêú Ìä∏Î¶¨Î•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏøºÎ¶¨Î•º Í±∞Íæ∏Î°ú Î≥¥Î©¥ÏÑú Í≤ΩÎ°ú ÏøºÎ¶¨Î°ú Í∏∏Ïù¥ ÏûàÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞Î•º Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ÌïúÎã§.

‚Üí penguins Ïó∞ÏÇ∞ÏùÄ Ïó≠ÏúºÎ°ú ÎèåÏïÑÍ∞ÄÎäî ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Ìï¥ÏïºÌïúÎã§. (ÏÑ∏Í∑∏Î®ºÌä∏ Ìä∏Î¶¨ updateÌïòÎ©¥ ÎêúÎã§. )

  • ÎßàÏßÄÎßâÏúºÎ°ú Í≤∞Í≥ºÎ•º Ï∂úÎ†•Ìï† Îïå
    • bridgeÎùºÎ©¥
      • ÎØ∏Î¶¨ Ï†ÄÏû•Îêú 1 ‚Üí yes 0 ‚Üí no
    • penguinsÎùºÎ©¥
      • continue
    • excursionÎùºÎ©¥
      • UnionfindÎ°ú ÌèâÍ∞ÄÌñàÏùÑ Îïå Ïù¥ÎØ∏ -1 ‚Üí ‚Äúimpossible‚Äù
      • Í∑∏Í≤å ÏïÑÎãàÎùºÎ©¥ query(a, b)

ÏûêÏÑ∏ÌïúÍ±¥ ÏïÑÎûò ÏΩîÎìúÏóêÏÑú Ï£ºÏÑù Ï≤òÎ¶¨Î°ú Î≥¥Ïù¥Í≤†Îã§.

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define fast_io cin.tie(NULL); ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef tuple<int, int, int> tiii;
#define xx first
#define yy second

const int MAXSIZE = 3e4+1;
int P[MAXSIZE];

struct DisjointSet{
    vector<int> parent, rank;
    
    DisjointSet(int n):parent(n+1),rank(n+1, 0){
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
            parent[i] = i;
        }
    }
    
    int find(int u){
        if(u==parent[u]) return u;
        return parent[u] = find(parent[u]);
    }
    
    bool merge(int u, int v){
        u = find(u);
        v = find(v);
        if(u==v) return true;
        
        if(rank[u]>rank[v]) swap(u, v);
        parent[u] = v;
        if(rank[u]==rank[v]) rank[v]++;
        return false;
    }
    bool check(int u, int v){
        u = find(u);
        v = find(v);
        if(u==v) return true;
        return false;
    }
};

// Íµ¨Í∞ÑÌï© ÏÑ∏Í∑∏
template <class T>
class Segtree{
public:
    static const int TREESIZE = 4*MAXSIZE;
    T* tree = new T[TREESIZE];

    Segtree(){
        for(int i=0;i<TREESIZE;i++) tree[i] = 0;
    }
    ~Segtree(){
        delete[] tree;
    }
    T update(T x, T v, T node, T S, T E){
        if(S==E) return tree[node] = v; // ÏõêÏÜåÍµêÏ≤¥Ïó∞ÏÇ∞, ÎçîÌïòÍ∏∞Î©¥ +ÌïòÏÖà
        
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(x<=mid) update(x, v, 2*node, S, mid);
        else update(x, v, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
        return tree[node] = tree[2*node]+tree[2*node+1];
    }
    T kth(T node, T S, T E, T K){
        if(S==E) return S;
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        if(tree[2*node]>=K) return kth(2*node, S, mid, K);
        else return kth(2*node+1, mid+1, E, K-tree[2*node]);
    }
    T query(T L, T R, T node, T S, T E){
        if(L>E||R<S) return 0;
        if(L<=S&&E<=R) return tree[node];
        T mid = (S+E)>>1;
        return query(L, R, 2*node, S, mid)+query(L, R, 2*node+1, mid+1, E);
    }
};
// Í≤ΩÎ°ú Ï§ë ÏµúÎåÄÍ∞í Ï∞æÍ∏∞
template <class T>
class HLD{
public:
    int n;
    T cost[MAXSIZE], sz[MAXSIZE], dep[MAXSIZE], par[MAXSIZE];
    T top[MAXSIZE], in[MAXSIZE], out[MAXSIZE];
    vector<pair<T, T>> input, inp[MAXSIZE];
    vector<T> adj[MAXSIZE];
    
    bool visited[MAXSIZE];
    
    void dfs(int now = 0){
        visited[now] = 1;
        for(auto [ncost, nxt] : inp[now]){
            if(visited[nxt]) continue;
            adj[now].push_back(nxt);
            cost[nxt] = ncost;
            dfs(nxt);
        }
    }
    
    void dfs1(int now = 0){
        sz[now] = 1;
        for(T& nxt : adj[now]){
            dep[nxt] = dep[now]+1;
            par[nxt] = now;
            dfs1(nxt);
            sz[now] += sz[nxt];
            if(sz[nxt]>sz[adj[now][0]]) swap(nxt, adj[now][0]); //adj[now][0]ÏóêÎäî Í∞ÄÏû•ÌÅ∞Í≤É (heavy)
        }
    }
    
    int tmp = -1;
    void dfs2(int now = 0){
        in[now] = ++tmp;
        for(T nxt : adj[now]){
            top[nxt] = (nxt==adj[now][0] ? top[now] : nxt);
            dfs2(nxt);
        }
        out[now] = tmp;
    }
    
    Segtree<T> st;
    
    // i Î≤à Í∞ÑÏÑ†ÏùÑ valÎ°ú
    void update(T i, T val){
        if(dep[input[i].xx] < dep[input[i].yy]) swap(input[i].yy, input[i].xx);
        st.update(in[input[i].xx], val, 1, 0, n);
    }
    
    //u, vÍ≤ΩÎ°úÏÉÅ Ìé≠Í∑ÑÏùò Ïàò
    T query(T u, T v){
        T ret = 0;
        while(top[u]!=top[v]){
            if(dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            int ST = top[u];
            ret += st.query(in[ST], in[u], 1, 0, MAXSIZE);
            u = par[ST];
        }
        if(dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        ret += st.query(in[u], in[v], 1, 0, MAXSIZE);
        return ret;
    }
    
    int lca(int u, int v) {
        while (top[u] != top[v]) {
            if (dep[top[u]] < dep[top[v]]) swap(u, v);
            u = par[top[u]];
        }
        if (dep[u] > dep[v]) swap(u, v);
        return u;
    }
    
    void precal(){
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
            inp[0].push_back({1, i});
            inp[i].push_back({1, 0});
        }
        
        top[0] = 1;
        dfs(); dfs1(); dfs2();
    }
};

DisjointSet uf(MAXSIZE);
HLD<int> hld;

class Data{
public:
    string op;
    int a, b ,idx, p,q;
};

pair<string, int> ans[300005];
int main(){
    fast_io
    int n; cin >> n;
    hld.n = n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) cin >> P[i];
    int q; cin >> q;
    vector<Data> Q(q+1);
    for(int i=1;i<=q;i++){
        string op;
        int a, b;
        cin >> op >> a >> b;
        if(op=="bridge"){
            if(uf.merge(a, b)){//Ïù¥ÎØ∏ Ìï©Ï≥êÏ†∏ÏûàÏùå
                ans[i] = {"bridge", 0};
            }else{//Ìï©Ï≥êÏïºÌï®
                ans[i] = {"bridge", 1};
                hld.inp[a].push_back({1, b});
                hld.inp[b].push_back({1, a});
            }
            Q[i] = {op, a, b, i, -1, -1};
            
        }else if(op=="penguins"){
            Q[i] = {op, a, b, i, P[a], b};
            P[a] = b;
        }else{
            if(uf.check(a, b)){ //Ïù¥ÎØ∏ Ìï©Ï≥êÏ†∏ ÏûàÏùå
                Q[i] = {op, a, b, i, a, b};
            }else{
                ans[i] = {"excursion", -1};
                Q[i] = {op, a, b, i, -1, -1};
            }
        }
    }
    
    hld.precal();   //0Ïù¥ Î£®Ìä∏Ïù∏ ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Ìä∏Î¶¨
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ //Ìé≠Í∑ÑÏùÑ Í∞Å ÏÑ¨Ïóê ÎÑ£Ïñ¥Ï§å
        hld.st.update(hld.in[i], P[i], 1, 0, MAXSIZE);
    }
    
    
    for(int i=q;i>=1;i--){
        if(Q[i].op=="bridge") continue;
	        if(Q[i].op=="penguins"){
            hld.st.update(hld.in[Q[i].a], Q[i].p, 1, 0, MAXSIZE);
            ans[Q[i].idx] = {Q[i].op, 0};
        }else{
            if(Q[i].p==-1) continue;
            ans[Q[i].idx] = {Q[i].op, hld.query(Q[i].a, Q[i].b)};
        }
    }
    
    for(int i=1;i<=q;i++){
        if(ans[i].xx=="bridge"){
            if(ans[i].yy) cout << "yes\n";
            else cout << "no\n";
        }else if(ans[i].xx=="penguins"){
            continue;
        }else{
            if(ans[i].yy==-1) cout << "impossible\n";
            else cout << ans[i].yy << '\n';
        }
    }
}
